name: Carrot-lang
body:
# carrot-lang This is Carrot lang. Carrot is a simple templating language that can be embedded into HTML. Right now, I'm working on using this for Imageup for custom user pages. Use file extension `.html.crt` and run `preprocessor.rb` to use it. ## Usage Embed carrot in html between `{{ }}`. ```html {{ name="Matt" }}

Hi, This is {{ name }}'s website.

{{ photos }} {{ photos }} ``` This will output the following `html`, eventually: ```html

Hi, This is Matt's website.

```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
